## Meeting Schedule and Overview

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Week <- c(1:14)
Date <- c("01/23","01/30","02/06","02/13","02/20","02/27","03/06","03/13","03/20","03/27","04/03","04/10","04/17","04/24")
Topic <- c("Intro","","","","","","","Spring Break","","","","","","")
Speaker <- c("Instructors","","","","","","","Spring Break","","","","","","")
Assignment <- c("","","","","","","","","Spring Break","","","","","")

meetings <- cbind(Week,Date,Topic, Speaker, Assignment)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
